action.text: Proposed amendment SA 5 withdrawn in Senate.
Cloture on amendment SA 5 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 47. Record Vote Number: 9.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 5 presented in Senate.
Amendment SA 5 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Shelby. (consideration: CR S325) Of a perfecting nature.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Cloture on amendment SA 5 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 47. Record Vote Number: 9.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Shelby.
